long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Diamond Paint, a captivating game that combines number sequencing with color filling. This educational and artistic game invites you to create sparkling masterpieces by matching numbered diamonds to their corresponding spots on the canvas. With over 101 different images to color, each more intricate than the last, you'll enjoy an increasingly challenging and engaging experience. As you progress, the complexity of the pictures and the number of colored diamonds increase, ensuring that every level is as exciting as the first. Dive into the world of Diamond Paint and unleash your creativity!
